job_tasks.justification: This task involves integrating different system components (database, payment provider, app, print management system), which falls under software integration.

job_tasks.justification: Implementing continuous integration and test-driven development are key practices in software operations and deployment pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: putten uit en bijdragen aan verschillende open source projecten

job_tasks.justification: Problem-solving, especially in collaboration with other technical experts, is a core software development activity.

soft_skills.justification: This directly refers to problem-solving, particularly complex issues, and collaboration with experts.

soft_skills.phrase: Werken in een klein, multidisciplinair team van professionals in een snelle startup-omgeving

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on traditional software development tasks (building and maintaining web/mobile apps, integration, CI/CD) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it mentions using AI models like GPT to enhance productivity and code quality, the core responsibilities do not involve developing or fine-tuning AI models themselves (Macro-Category B). The role is about integrating AI as a tool to improve the software engineering process, rather than building AI systems as the end product. Therefore, it fits the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines traditional software engineering responsibilities and mentions the use of AI (GPT) as a productivity tool. The distinction between building AI systems and using AI tools is evident. However, the description of how AI is used is somewhat general ('increase productivity', 'improve code quality'), which prevents a perfect score. A more detailed explanation of the AI integration would increase confidence.
